function solution(participant, completion) {
  let obj = {};
  for (let p of participant) {
    obj[p] = !!obj[p] ? obj[p] + 1 : 1;
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < completion.length; i++) {
    if (obj[completion[i]] === undefined) {
      continue;
    }
    obj[completion[i]] = obj[completion[i]] - 1;
  }
  console.log("obj", obj);

  const entries = Object.entries(obj);
  console.log("entries", entries);
  for ([name, complete] of entries) {
    if (complete > 0) {
      return name;
    }
  }
}

let test1P = ["marina", "josipa", "nikola", "vinko", "filipa"];
let test1C = ["josipa", "filipa", "marina", "nikola"];
let test2P = ["mislav", "stanko", "mislav", "ana"];
let test2C = ["stanko", "ana", "mislav"];

console.log("result : ", solution(test1P, test1C));
console.log("result : ", solution(test2P, test2C));
